combat1.name: Normal Attack: Guhua Style
combat1.info:
**Normal Attack**
Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

**Charged Attack**
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

**Plunging Attack**
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

combat2.name: Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen
combat2.info:
Xingqiu performs twin strikes with his sword, dealing Hydro DMG. At the same time, this ability creates the maximum number of Rain Swords, which will orbit your active character.
The Rain Swords have the following properties:
路When a character takes DMG, the Rain Sword will shatter, reducing the amount of DMG taken.
路Increases the character's resistance to interruption.
20% of Xingqiu's Hydro DMG Bonus will be converted to additional DMG Reduction for the Rain Swords.

The maximum amount of additional DMG Reduction that can be gained this way is 24%.
The initial maximum number of Rain Swords is 3.
Using this ability applies the Wet status onto the character.
combat2.description: "Easier to slay a rain dragon than to sever the rain."

combat3.name: Guhua Sword: Raincutter
combat3.info:
Initiate Rainbow Bladework and fight using an illusory sword rain, while creating the maximum number of Rain Swords.

**Rainbow Bladework**
路Your active character's Normal Attacks will trigger consecutive sword rain attacks, dealing Hydro DMG.
路Rain Swords will remain at the maximum number throughout the ability's duration.
combat3.description: The "Way of the Rain Cutter" is one of the esoteric secret techniques of the Guhua Sect.

passive1.name: Hydropathic
passive1.info: When a Rain Sword is shattered or when its duration expires, it regenerates the current character's HP based on 6% of Xingqiu's Max HP.

passive2.name: Blades Amidst Raindrops
passive2.info: Xingqiu gains a 20% Hydro DMG Bonus.

passive3.name: Flash of Genius
passive3.info: When Xingqiu crafts Character Talent Materials, he has a 25% chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.
